channel.title: LLMs on cool as heck
channel.description: Recent content in LLMs on cool as heck

item.title: More Thoughts on AI and LLMs in Search
item.description: My friend and I were discussing AI/LLM search, and while I think some LLM search can be useful, you have to make it work for you.

item.title: Google Gemini and Unsustainable LLMs
item.description: Reading up on the announcements from Google I/O got me thinking more about how LLMs source their content and how they present it.
